name: @sakuraapi/auth-native-authority
description: Middleware to support native authentication capabilities

scripts.build: rm -rf lib/ ; tsc && npm run build:test
scripts.istanbul:run: npm run build && npm run build:test && npm run istanbul cover --include-all-sources node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js
scripts.lint: npm run build && npm run build:test && npm run lint:tests && npm run lint:code
scripts.lint:code: echo 'CODE LINT' ; npm run tslint -- -e "node_modules/**/**/*.ts"  -e "**/**/*.d.ts" -e "**/**/*.spec.ts" -e "spec/**/**" -t stylish --fix src/**/*.ts
scripts.lint:tests: echo 'TEST LINT' ; npm run tslint -- -e "node_modules/**/**/*.ts"  -e "**/**/*.d.ts" -t stylish --fix -c tslint.spec.json src/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.prepublish: npm build && npm test && npm run nsp check
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run jasmine

author: Jean-Pierre E. Poveda
